a chili sauce that has long been
a pride  The Tunisian people's pride is called
harrisale, which has put this dish on the
list of intangible cultural heritage of humanity.
Some families in Tunisia have had a
tradition of making harrisa for decades. This is
a spicy chili sauce made  Red chili peppers are
described by Unesco as an indispensable part
of the cuisine and
daily meals of Tunisians. People
often pick chili peppers grown on the
farm, then wash them, dry them and
grind them with a stone mortar.  The product is usually
stored in a glass jar after mixing
with olive oil. Buy chili peppers in Tonyci starting
around April with many different varieties of chili peppers.
Nabilon is a town
famous for its variety of red chili peppers and is the
center of the craft.  Making traditional Harry sa, there
is also an annual harrisa festival
at the end of October selling

updated information, ladies and gentlemen, last night
Vietnam time, the US House of Representatives voted to
accept Mr. Tra Phim Makachi
from the position of Speaker of the House of Representatives, the first time
this event happened in US history
with 216 votes.  Yes vote and 210 blank votes The
US House of Representatives voted for the first time to
remove the speaker of the House of Representatives. Among
his highest supporters, Katy
had 8 Republican members and 208
Democrats.  The
dismissal of Chairman Kevin Marketi is a proposal
from the extreme Right Republican Congressman
representing the state of Florida. This congressman
accused the Speaker of the House of Representatives of Katy for not
doing all his responsibilities in cutting
federal party spending.  Republicans
control the House of Representatives with a majority of
221 212 seats. This is the first time in the
history of the US House of Representatives to support a Resolution to
dismiss the chairman of this body. This is the
latest development in a series of issues taking place.
in the US House of Representatives when the country faced the
brink of default and the Government had to partially shut down. The
